### SS carousel
```jsx
const styles = {height: '500px', width: '215px'};
<SingleSlideCarousel flipperNextLabel='View Next' flipperPrevLabel='View Previous' parentId='1'>
    <li className='bg-primary mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='Primary slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-secondary mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='secondary slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-success mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='success slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-danger mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='danger slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-warning mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='warning slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-info mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='info slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-light mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='light slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-dark mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='dark slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-warning mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='warning slider' tabIndex={0}/>
</SingleSlideCarousel>
```
### Vertical carousel
```jsx
const styles = {height: '215px', width: '200px'};
<div style={{height: '800px'}}>
    <SingleSlideCarousel vertical={true} flipperNextLabel='View Next' flipperPrevLabel='View Previous' parentId='2'>
        <li className='bg-primary mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='Primary slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-secondary mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='secondary slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-success mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='success slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-danger mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='danger slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-warning mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='warning slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-info mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='info slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-light mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='light slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-dark mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='dark slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-warning mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='warning slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    </SingleSlideCarousel>
    <div style={{width: '25px', height: '800px', display: 'inline-block'}} />
    <SingleSlideCarousel vertical={true} flipperNextLabel='View Next' flipperPrevLabel='View Previous' parentId='3'>
        <li className='bg-warning mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='warning slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-primary mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='Primary slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-secondary mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='secondary slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-success mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='success slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-danger mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='danger slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-warning mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='warning slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-info mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='info slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-light mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='light slider' tabIndex={0}/>
        <li className='bg-dark mb-2' style={styles} aria-label='dark slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    </SingleSlideCarousel>
</div>
```

### SASS variables

```scss { "sassVariablesFile": "../scss/_variables.scss"}
```
### All Examples

```jsx noeditor
const styles = {height: '500px', width: '215px'};
<div class="vvt-single-slide-carousel">
<SingleSlideCarousel flipperNextLabel='View Next' flipperPrevLabel='View Previous' parentId='4'>
    <li className='bg-primary mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='Primary slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-secondary mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='secondary slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-success mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='success slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-danger mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='danger slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-warning mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='warning slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-info mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='info slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-light mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='light slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-dark mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='dark slider' tabIndex={0}/>
    <li className='bg-warning mr-2' style={styles} aria-label='warning slider' tabIndex={0}/>
</SingleSlideCarousel>
</div>
```
